languages.text: This rifle has 3 different {g|Encyclopedia:BurstAttacksGlossary}burst{/g} attacks with different {g|Encyclopedia:RateOfFire}rate of fire{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}. Each {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g} only one of these burst attacks is available, determined randomly.
languages.original_text: У этого оружия есть 3 варианта атаки {g|Encyclopedia:BurstAttacksGlossary}очередью{/g} с разными {g|Encyclopedia:RateOfFire}скорострельностью{/g} и {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}уроном{/g}. Каждый {g|Encyclopedia:Round}раунд{/g} доступен только один из вариантов, определенный случайным образом.

traits.locale_text: The targets it hit gain a stacking decay effect. Decay: the target suffers 3 direct damage at the end of its turn. Grants +5 minimal damage, +10 maximal damage, +10% armour penetration, +5% hit and critical hit chance, and +1 rate of fire.

This rifle has 3 different {g|Encyclopedia:BurstAttacks}burst{/g} attacks with different rate of fire and damage. Each {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g} only one of these burst attacks is available, determined randomly.

This rifle has 3 different {g|Encyclopedia:BurstAttacksGlossary}burst{/g} attacks with different {g|Encyclopedia:RateOfFire}rate of fire{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}. Each {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g} only one of these burst attacks is available, determined randomly.

This rifle has 3 different {g|Encyclopedia:BurstAttacksGlossary}burst{/g} attacks with different {g|Encyclopedia:RateOfFire}rate of fire{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}. Each {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g} only one of these burst attacks is available, determined randomly.

languages.text: У этого оружия есть 3 варианта атаки {g|Encyclopedia:BurstAttacksGlossary}очередью{/g} с разными {g|Encyclopedia:RateOfFire}скорострельностью{/g} и {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}уроном{/g}. Каждый {g|Encyclopedia:Round}раунд{/g} доступен только один из вариантов, определенный случайным образом.
languages.original_text: When hit by this weapon, the target suffers a stacking decay effect. Decay: the target suffers 3 direct damage at the end of its turn. Grants +5 minimum damage, +10 maximum damage, +10% armour penetration, +5% hit and critical hit chance, and +1 rate of fire.

traits.locale_text: Цель, пораженная этим оружием, получает уровень эффекта "разложение". Разложение: в конце своего хода цель получает 3 прямого урона. Дает +5 к минимальному урону, +10 к максимальному урону, +10% к пробитию брони, +5% к шансу попадания и критического попадания и +1 к скорострельности.

Цель, пораженная этим оружием, получает уровень эффекта "разложение". Разложение: в конце своего хода цель получает 3 прямого урона. Дает +5 к минимальному урону, +10 к максимальному урону, +10% к пробитию брони, +5% к шансу попадания и критического попадания и +1 к скорострельности.

languages.text: 这把步枪有三种不同的{g|Encyclopedia:BurstAttacksGlossary}连发{/g}射击模式，{g|Encyclopedia:RateOfFire}射速{/g}与{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}伤害{/g}各不相同。每{g|Encyclopedia:Round}轮{/g}中只能使用其中一种连发模式，具体使用的连发模式随机决定。
languages.original_text: This rifle has 3 different {g|Encyclopedia:BurstAttacksGlossary}burst{/g} attacks with different {g|Encyclopedia:RateOfFire}rate of fire{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}. Each {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g} only one of these burst attacks is available, determined randomly.

traits.locale_text: 被这把武器{g|Encyclopedia:Hit}命中{/g}的目标会获得1层{g|Encyclopedia:DecayEffect}腐朽{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatuses}效果{/g}。 腐朽：目标在{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}回合{/g}结束时受到3点直击伤害。 获得+5最小伤害，+10最大伤害，+10%{g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}护甲穿透{/g}，+5%{g|Encyclopedia:HitChance}命中率{/g}与暴击率，以及+1{g|Encyclopedia:RateOfFire}射速{/g}。

languages.text: このライフルは3つの異なる{g|Encyclopedia:BurstAttacksGlossary}バースト{/g}攻撃が使えて、それぞれ{g|Encyclopedia:RateOfFire}発射速度{/g}と{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}ダメージ量{/g}が違う。各{g|Encyclopedia:Round}ラウンド{/g}でこのバースト攻撃のうち1つのみ使えて、ランダムで選ばれる。
languages.original_text: This rifle has 3 different {g|Encyclopedia:BurstAttacksGlossary}burst{/g} attacks with different {g|Encyclopedia:RateOfFire}rate of fire{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}. Each {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g} only one of these burst attacks is available, determined randomly.

traits.locale_text: この武器での攻撃が{g|Encyclopedia:Hit}命中{/g}すると、ターゲットはスタック累積{g|Encyclopedia:DecayEffect}減衰{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatuses}効果{/g}を受ける。 減衰：ターゲットは{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ターン{/g}終了時に直撃ダメージ3を受ける。 最小ダメージが5増加、最大ダメージが10増加、{g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}アーマー貫通{/g}が10％増加、命中率およびクリティカル{g|Encyclopedia:HitChance}ヒット率{/g}が5％増加、そして{g|Encyclopedia:RateOfFire}連射速度{/g}が1上昇する。

languages.text: Este rifle tiene 3 ataques de {g|Encyclopedia:BurstAttacksGlossary}ráfaga{/g}, cada uno con su {g|Encyclopedia:RateOfFire}cadencia de disparo{/g} y {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}daño{/g}. Cada {g|Encyclopedia:Round}asalto{/g}, solo está disponible uno de estos ataques de ráfaga determinado al azar.
languages.original_text: This rifle has 3 different {g|Encyclopedia:BurstAttacksGlossary}burst{/g} attacks with different {g|Encyclopedia:RateOfFire}rate of fire{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}. Each {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g} only one of these burst attacks is available, determined randomly.

traits.locale_text: Cuando esta arma {g|Encyclopedia:Hit}impacta{/g} a un objetivo, inflige un {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatuses}efecto{/g} acumulable de {g|Encyclopedia:DecayEffect}descomposición{/g}. Descomposición: el objetivo sufre 3 de daño directo al final de su {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turno{/g}. Otorga +5 de daño mínimo, +10 de daño máximo, +10 % de {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}penetración de armadura{/g}, +5 % de {g|Encyclopedia:HitChance}probabilidad de impacto{/g} y de crítico y +1 de {g|Encyclopedia:RateOfFire}cadencia de disparo{/g}.

languages.text: Dieses Gewehr hat 3 verschiedene {g|Encyclopedia:BurstAttacksGlossary}Salven{/g}-Angriffe mit unterschiedlicher {g|Encyclopedia:RateOfFire}Feuergeschwindigkeit{/g} und anderem {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}Schaden{/g}. Jede {g|Encyclopedia:Round}Runde{/g} ist nur einer dieser Salven-Angriffe verfügbar, der nach dem Zufallsprinzip bestimmt wird.
languages.original_text: This rifle has 3 different {g|Encyclopedia:BurstAttacksGlossary}burst{/g} attacks with different {g|Encyclopedia:RateOfFire}rate of fire{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}. Each {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g} only one of these burst attacks is available, determined randomly.

traits.locale_text: Wenn diese Waffe {g|Encyclopedia:Hit}trifft{/g}, erleidet das Ziel den aufaddierbaren {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatuses}Effekt{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:DecayEffect}Verfall{/g}. Verfall: Das Ziel erleidet am Ende seines {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}Zugs{/g} 3 direkten Schaden. Gewährt +5 Mindestschaden, +10 Maximalschaden, +10% {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}Rüstungsdurchdringung{/g}, +5% Treffer- und kritische {g|Encyclopedia:HitChance}Trefferchance{/g} und +1 {g|Encyclopedia:RateOfFire} Feuergeschwindigkeit{/g}.

languages.text: Ce fusil dispose de 3 attaques {g|Encyclopedia:BurstAttacksGlossary}en rafale{/g} distinctes dont la {g|Encyclopedia:RateOfFire}cadence de tir{/g} et les {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}dégâts{/g} infligés diffèrent. À chaque {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}, une seule de ces attaques en rafale, déterminée de manière aléatoire, est disponible.
languages.original_text: This rifle has 3 different {g|Encyclopedia:BurstAttacksGlossary}burst{/g} attacks with different {g|Encyclopedia:RateOfFire}rate of fire{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}. Each {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g} only one of these burst attacks is available, determined randomly.

traits.locale_text: Lorsque cette arme {g|Encyclopedia:Hit}touche{/g} la cible, celle-ci subit un cumul de l'{g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatuses}effet{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:DecayEffect}Décomposition{/g}. Décomposition : la cible subit 3 points de dégâts directs à la fin de son {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}tour{/g}. Confère +5 points de dégâts minimum, +10 points de dégâts maximum, +10 % de {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}pénétration d'armure{/g}, +5 % de chances d'infliger un coup et d'infliger un {g|Encyclopedia:HitChance}coup critique{/g}, et +1 de {g|Encyclopedia:RateOfFire}cadence de tir{/g}.
